message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, just as it has been for me.  Given its potential, I'm offering it to you for $1,500,000.
Alice, I understand the value you place on the product, but given my current financial situation, I am only able to offer $1,200,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm confident this product will bring you far more than $200,000 in value. How about we meet in the middle at $1,350,000?
Alice, I've considered your proposal, but due to my budget constraints, I can't exceed $1,250,000 for the product. I hope this offer meets somewhere in the middle of our valuations.
